info.title: AdEx Partner Management API
info.description: This API allows users to search through the AdEx Partner List, which includes agencies, technology providers, integration/service partners, and vendors. The Partner List provides detailed information about each partner, including their profiles, industry focus, and contact details. This tool is essential for managing partnerships and accessing important documents like NDAs and contract agreements.

x-column-descriptions.Category: Type of partnership, e.g., Consultancy, Vendor.
x-column-descriptions.Active exchange with the partner in the: Indicates if there was active exchange.
x-column-descriptions.Active business relationship (referral o: Indicates if there was a business relationship.
x-column-descriptions.Industry Focus: Industries the partner is focused on.
x-column-descriptions.Functional Focus: Functional areas the partner specializes in.
x-column-descriptions.Partner Contact: Contact person at the partner company.
x-column-descriptions.Mail: Email address of the contact person.
x-column-descriptions.Phone: Phone number of the contact person.
x-column-descriptions.Offer?: Indicates if an offer is available.
